configStructure.name: script
configStructure.description: The content of the plugin to be executed

configStructure.name: additionalModules
configStructure.description: Comma separated list of modules to be imported to the execution of the script

configStructure.name: maxRunTime
configStructure.description: Time in seconds how long the python script execution is allowed to run

configStructure.name: python
configStructure.description: Select the main version of python to run
